job.title: Software Engineer In Test
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtAbout GameChangerltstronggtltpgtltpgtWe believe sports are important because they encourage leadership teamwork responsibility and confidencecritical life lessons that have the power to propel our youthampnbsptoward meaningful futures We recognize that without coaches parents and volunteers organized youth sports could not exist We celebrate those dedicated heroes and make it our mission to help them do what they do bestltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtGameChanger provides teams across the country with team management and scorekeeping capabilities as well as live fan experiences that keep parents family and friends engaged as games are announced animated and video streamed in realtime With GameChanger coaches and parents are able to organize and follow their athletes journey in a simple and powerful wayltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtBased in downtown Manhattan GameChanger is a cuttingedge technology company and a proud member of the DICKS Sporting Goods familyltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtThe PositionampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtAs an SDET you will work with our Platform team to ensure that iOS Android and web applications meet our high standards for quality You will be responsible for building test automation frameworks and maintaining the test suites across our platformsampnbspThis is a fulltime position within GameChangers Engineering Department and can be located either remotely throughout the US or at our headquarters in NYCltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat Youll DoltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtLead quality assurance on our fastpaced Platform teamltligtltligtEstablish and maintain an automated test environment for UI testing for our Android iOS and Web appsltligtltligtIntegrate with test case management bug tracking source control and continuous integration platformsltligtltligtEducate team members on test automationltligtltligtDesign document execute and troubleshoot automated test scenariosltligtltligtEstimate test efforts analyze and communicate test results and participate in QA activitiesampnbspltligtltligtIdentify required improvements in the test and development processes and make contributions to our automation toolsampnbspltligtltligtCoordinate with Platform team and engineers to deliver stable product releasesltligtltligtLearn and understand release processes while improving and expanding our test coverageltligtltligtContribute to planning sessionsltligtltligtDocument issues using a bugtracking systemltligtltligtCommunicate issues found concerns and feedback back to the teamampnbspltligtltligtManage release processesltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWho You Areltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt3 years experience in building automated testing frameworks including for iOS and Android native appsltligtltligtExperience in test automation scripting using Python Espresso Java XCUI Test Swift and SeleniumampnbspltligtltligtExperience in API testing load testing performance testing and security testingltligtltligtExperience working in an Agile development processltligtltligtExperience testing iOS and Android native appsltligtltligtPositive energy and a friendly collaborative attitudeltligtltligtSelfstarter who has good attention to detail and qualityltligtltligtAbility to tradeoff getting tasks done with stepping back to see the big pictureltligtltligtPrecision in isolating issues and identifying steps to reproduceltligtltligtSound judgment and problemsolving abilitiesltligtltligtBachelors Degree in Computer ScienceltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtampnbspltstronggtPerksltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtWork remotely or from our wellfurnished modern office in NYCs FiDiltligtltligtUnlimited vacation policyltligtltligtTechnology stipend  3500 every 2 years to purchase new technologyltligtltligtFull health benefits  medical dental vision prescription FSAHRA etc as well as coverage for familydependentsltligtltligtLife insurance  basic life supplemental life and dependent lifeltligtltligtDisability leave  shortterm disability and longterm disabilityltligtltligtRetirement savings  401K plan offered through VanguardltligtltligtGenerous maternitypaternity leaveltligtltligtCommuter benefitsltligtltligtDICKS Sporting Goods Teammate DiscountltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability statusltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtIn your cover letter please tell us why youre interested in the SDET position and GameChangerltstronggtltpgt
